H0.text: the complete collection of dna and genes is called. Chromosomome

H1.text: the complete collection of dna and genes is called. Genotype

H2.text: the complete collection of dna and genes is called. DNAome

H3.text: the complete collection of dna and genes is called. genome

A4.text: A genome is all the genetic information of an organism or cell.

A5.text: The term 'genome' usually refers to the DNA (or sometimes RNA) molecules that carry the genetic information in an organism.
